benchmark_details.name: WikiMem
benchmark_details.overview: WikiMem is a dataset of over 5,000 natural language canaries covering 243 human-related properties from Wikidata, and a model-agnostic metric to quantify humanâ€“fact associations in LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a foundation for identifying and quantifying personal data in LLMs at the individual level, enabling dynamic construction of forget sets for machine unlearning and RTBF requests.

methodology.calculation: Scores are derived from calibrated NLL ranking over counterfactuals.
methodology.interpretation: Model memorization is determined by whether ground-truth values are ranked first.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The study focuses on transparency and supporting RTBF compliance by measuring factual memorization, emphasizing the importance of privacy in LLMs.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: The dataset will be made publicly available under CC-BY.
